snippet: Many parents object to a city plan to switch some children from a crowded, successful school on West 70th Street to a West 61st Street school that has earned an unwanted state designation.
abstract: Parents on Upper West Side of Manhattan are protesting proposal by New York City Education Dept to rezone several blocks of buildings to address overcrowding at Public School 199 on West 70th Street; proposal, which would be controversial under normal circumstances, is particularly contentious due to fact that school to which students will be redirected is PS 191, which was listed on state's list of dangerous schools.
lead_paragraph: Many parents object to a city plan to switch some children from a crowded, successful school on West 70th Street to a West 61st Street school that has earned an unwanted state designation.

headline.print_headline: Parents Resist City Plan That Shifts Students to School Called Dangerous
headline.main: Manhattan Rezoning Fight Involves a School Called ‘Persistently Dangerous’
